Name: Everburn Blade
Description: Looted from Commander Zhalk at the helm of the Nautiloid during the Prologue or can also be obtained by casting Command (Drop) on Commander Zhalk instead of killing him, though his chance of succeeding the Saving Throw is high.

Name: The Watcher's Guide
Description: Found in a trapped sarcophagus with a booby trap where traps will shoot exploding fireballs at you from either side if you do not disable them by pressing the button after opening the sarcophagus.

Name: The Amulet of Lost Voices
Description: Looted from a heavy chest in the same room that Withers emerges.

Name: Gloves of Power
Description: Looted from the Goblin Boss Za'Krug in front of the Druid Grove.

Name: Silver Pendant
Description: Looted from a skeleton on the cliff southwest of the Druid Grove by jumping up two small ridges and climbing a wooden ladder to reach this area. (X:160, Y:373)

Name: Fleetfingers
Description: Can be found inside a buried chest in the Forest (X:77, Y:347).

Name: Ring of Evasion
Description: Given by Tara during the first Long Rest following completion of the Escape the Nautiloid quest (only when playing as the Gale Origin).

Name: Ring of Flinging
Description: 84 gp.

Name: Corellon's Grace
Description: This weapon can be bought (210 gp) or looted from Auntie Ethel in the Riverside Teahouse or the Hollow in the Druid Grove.

Name: Shapeshifter's Boon Ring
Description: Can be looted from the Strange Ox in the Druid Grove, or later at Dammon's blacksmith in the Last Light Inn. (If you kill the Strange Ox, you won't be able to complete the "Help the Devilish Ox" quest.)

Name: The Whispering Promise
Description: Sold by Volo in the Druid Grove, who may not initially appear to be a trader, but there is a coin icon button in the bottom left that will allow you to engage in trading with him, and also sold by Grat the Trader in the Goblin Camp.

Name: Instrument Proficiency
Description: Pass two Charisma (Performance) checks while helping Alfira with her song in the Druid Grove.

Name: Cap of Curing
Description: This hat is found in a locked gilded chest behind a pillar near to where Alfira is composing her song in the Druid Grove (X:289, Y:488).

Name: Ring of Colour Spray
Description: Can be found in the Harpys' Nest in the Secluded Cove (X:326, Y:495).

Name: Amulet of Silvanus
Description: Hidden under a rock that must be moved, near Ormn the bear in the Druid Grove (X:262, Y:481).

Name: Nature's Snare
Description: Looted from a locked chest within the Underground Passage of the Druid Grove, with the key to the chest located on a corpse on the lower part of the island in the middle, guarded by two turret statues. (X:-425, Y:-200)

Name: Key of the Ancients
Description: Dropped by Findal in the Underground Passage connecting to the Druid Grove and also by Nettie at Druid Grove.

Name: Komira's Locket
Description: Given to you by Arabella's parents after protecting her from Kagha in "Save Arabella".

Name: Broodmother's Revenge
Description: Dropped by Kagha at Druid Grove.

Name: Hellrider's Pride
Description: Carried by Zevlor in the Druid Grove and can be either bought from him, stolen or earned as a reward for "Investigate Kagha".

Name: Robe of Summer
Description: Found inside a crate sitting in the Hidden Vault within the Druid Grove. You will need the Rune of the Wolf carried by Rath to access the vault; which you can obtain by talking to Rath after rescuing Halsin, pickpocketing him, or killing him.

Name: Pale Oak
Description: Obtained as a reward for completing the quest "Investigate Kagha" and both persuading and sparing Kagha, which must be completed before the quest "Rescue the Druid Halsin". In this scenario, Kagha will give you the Pale Oak. The Pale Oak staff is only awarded if you are a druid.

Name: Ring of Protection
Description: Rewarded by Mol for completing the quest "Steal the Sacred Idol".

Name: The Deathstalker Mantle
Description: Given to a player using The Dark Urge Origin by Sceleritas Fel as a reward for murdering the Bard.

Name: The Oakfather's Embrace
Description: Lootable from a headless skeleton, on Owlbear Nest.

Name: Moondrop Pendant
Description: Found in a Selûnite Glided Chest in the Owlbear Nest. You must read the Selûnite Prayer Sheet in front of the chest to unlock it. The sheet can be spotted on the ground behind the statue of Selûne by passing a Perception check.

Name: Vision of the Absolute
Description: Repaired by finding and combining the Shaft of a Broken Spear and the Head of a Broken Spear (by right-clicking on one of the items in your inventory and pressing 'combine', then dragging the other item into the open slot.) Shaft of a Broken Spear: Found on the body of Edowin in the forest west of the Druid Grove (X: 136, Y: 446), and Head of a Broken Spear: Looted from the Owlbear in the Owlbear Nest.

Name: Find Familiar: Scratch
Description: Leave Scratch with your scent so he joins your camp, then later when he offers you a ball, throw it to play fetch with him.

Name: The Sparkle Hands
Description: On the island across the river, where a group of Mud Mephits are located near a tree, you'll find a chest positioned with its back facing the mainland. (X:95, Y:210).

Name: Wood Woad Shield
Description: Can be looted from Wood Woads in the Sunlit Wetlands.

Name: Gandrel's Aspiration
Description: Dropped by Gandrel, he is a monster hunter, who can be found just to the Southwest of the Riverside Teahouse waypoint.

Name: Tarnished Charm
Description: Looted from Auntie Ethel in the Riverside Teahouse.

Name: The Ever-Seeing Eye
Description: Located in the treasure room in the Hag's Lair underneath the Gnarled Teahouse.

Name: Staff of Crones
Description: Looted from the ground in the treasure room of the Ancient Abode (the Hag's lair) beneath Auntie Ethel's Teahouse.

Name: Auntie Ethel's Hair
Description: After Auntie Ethel is weakened (below 20% Hit Points) and has a turn to act, she begs for her life and implores you to let her keep Mayrina and her baby, offering you power in return. The player has the possibility to intimidate or deceive Auntie Ethel to free Mayrina and get this power both, at the cost of letting Auntie Ethel go.

Name: Paid the Price
Description: Consider Auntie Ethel's offer to eliminate the parasite at the Riverside Teahouse, but keep in mind it's mutually exclusive with Volo's Ersatz Eye and Wyll's stone eye options; you can only undergo one questionable eye surgery per character.

Name: Mayrina's Locket
Description: Mayrina's Locket can be obtained by either looting it from her corpse or persuading her to give it to you after learning Auntie Ethel's intentions through Speak with Dead.

Name: Warped Headband of Intellect
Description: Dropped by Lump the Enlightened in the Blighted Village (X:13, Y:366).

Name: Haste Helm
Description: Found inside the locked chest near to the Ancient Rune Circle in the Blighted Village (X:32, Y:403).

Name: Very Heavy Greataxe
Description: Dropped by Fezzerk in front of the windmill in the Blighted Village.

Name: Bloody Amulet
Description: Can be obtain from Barcus Wroot's corpse, located at different places: tied to the windmill in the Blighted Village (X:0, Y:425), in Grymforge if you freed him, or in your Camp if you recruited him in Grymforge.

Name: The Speedy Lightfeet
Description: Found inside a Heavy Chest in the cellar behind the windmill in the Blighted Village.

Name: Bracers of Defence
Description: In the secret area of the Apothecary's Cellar beneath the Blighted Village. The bracers are located in a gilded chest (X: -656 Y: -370).

Name: Steelforged Sword
Description: This weapon can be found in a locked chest in the abandoned workshop in the Blighted Village, across from the Ancient Rune Circle (X:45, Y:408).

Name: Sussur Weapons
Description: To forge a weapon, first, light the furnace, then use the nearby bellows, combine Sussur bark with the furnace, and finally, use a plain dagger, sickle, or greatsword in the active furnace to create a Sussur weapon with a +1 enchantment and the ability to silence on hit. Sussur Tree Bark can be obtained from the Sussur Tree in the Dread Hollow in the Underdark (X: -14, Y: -138).

Name: Summon Scroll: Cheeky Quasit
Description: In the Apothecary's Cellar, behind the moveable bookshelf, in the casket immediately to your right as you enter the cavernous room.

Name: Necromancy of Thay
Description: Turn all three pages while reading Necromancy of Thay, a book found in a hidden area in the Apothecary's Cellar beneath the Blighted Village. Turning only 1 page will grant only Speak with Dead. The reader does not need to succeed on the Saving Throws associated with turning the pages.

Name: Infernal Iron
Description: Inside a chest in the basement of a house (X: -434 Y: -370).

Name: Spiderstep Boots
Description: Found in a heavy chest in the Arachnomancer's lab within the Whispering Depths (X: -514 Y: -411).

Name: Spurred Band
Description: Found on a skeleton in the Whispering Depths (X:-495, Y:-365).

Name: Poisoner's Robe
Description: This robe is dropped by the Phase Spider Matriarch.

Name: Swiresy Shoes
Description: 74 gp.

Name: Crusher's Ring
Description: Worn by Crusher in the Goblin Camp. You can slip the ring off his toe when he demands you kiss his feet, or kill Crusher to take it off his body.

Name: Glowing Shield
Description: Found in a locked chest on a ridge behind the Goblin Camp (X: -53 Y: 461).

Name: Owlbear Cub
Description: First, encounter the mother Owlbear. After resting, find the Owlbear Cub in the Goblin Camp, free it through Chicken Chase or persuasion. After multiple rests, recruit the cub at the Campsite.

Name: Brand of the Absolute
Description: Agree to let a character be branded by Gut in the Goblin Camp.

Name: Loviatar's Love
Description: Submit to Abdirak and put on a good performance for him in the Shattered Sanctum.

Name: Absolute's Warboard
Description: Dropped by Priestess Gut in the Shattered Sanctum portion of the Goblin Camp.

Name: Absolute's Talisman
Description: Dropped by Priestess Gut in the Shattered Sanctum portion of the Goblin Camp.

Name: Amulet of Misty Step
Description: In a gilded chest behind the ogre Polma in the Defiled Temple within the Goblin Camp (X: 386 Y: 8).

Name: Ritual Dagger
Description: Looted from the table next to Abdirak in the Shattered Sanctum.

Name: Ritual Axe
Description: Looted from the table next to Abdirak in the Shattered Sanctum.

Name: Loviatar's Scourge
Description: Dropped by Abdirak in the Shattered Sanctum

Name: Faithbreaker
Description: Dropped by Dror Ragzlin in the Shattered Sanctum (X: 297 Y: 40).

Name: Springstep Boots
Description: Found in Dror Ragzlin's treasure pile in the Shattered Sanctum (X:296, Y:71).

Name: Gloves of the Growling Underdog
Description: Found in Dror Ragzlin's treasure pile in the Shattered Sanctum (X:296, Y:71).

Name: Assassin's Touch
Description: Reward for completing the quest "Save the Goblin Sazza" by escorting Sazza to the Goblin Camp.

Name: Xyanyde
Description: Wielded by by Minthara when recruited or dropped by her in the Shattered Sanctum. (X:332, Y:43).

Name: Spidersilk Armour
Description: Worn by Minthara when recruited or dropped by her in the Shattered Sanctum. (X:332, Y:43).

Name: Boots of Striding
Description: Worn by Minthara when recruited or dropped by her in the Shattered Sanctum. (X:332, Y:43).

Name: The Watersparkers
Description: Found in a chest in Minthara's area of the Shattered Sanctum.

Name: Jagged Spear
Description: On the ground near Torturer Spike in the Shattered Sanctum (X:334, Y:-37).

Name: Ring of Poison Resistance
Description: Found on a skeleton inside a sarcophagus just before the Worg Pens area of the Shattered Sanctum (X:338, Y:14).

Name: Worgfang
Description: Worgfang can be looted from a pile of bones in one of the cells within the Worg Pens area of the Goblin Camp (X: 386 Y: -17).

Name: Beastmaster's Chain
Description: In a chest near the area where two Goblins are stationed when you enter, you can find an amulet. Taking it while the Goblins are alive is considered theft, and they will caution you against touching it.

Name: Linebreaker Boots
Description: Dropped by Beastmaster Zurk in the Worg Pens.

Name: Blazer of Benevolence
Description: Reward for rescuing Volo from the Goblin Camp during "Rescue Volo".

Name: Wapira's Crown
Description: This helmet is given to you by Zevlor as thanks for helping the tiefling refugees during "Save the Refugees", provided you accept the monetary reward.

Name: Volo's Ersatz Eye
Description: Rescue Volo from the Goblin Camp. When speaking to him in the Campsite afterwards, tell him about your Tadpole infection and agree to his experimental surgery.

Name: Infernal Robe
Description: Recruit Wyll and kill Karlach. Mizora will reward Wyll with these when taking a Long Rest. (Wyll must be in your party.)

Name: Sword of Justice
Description: Looted from Anders in the Risen Road Toll House (X: 110 Y: 560) or given as a reward for killing Karlach in "Hunt the Devil".

Name: Gloves of Heroism
Description: Found inside a wooden chest at the back of the hidden room in the cellar of the Toll House (X: -674 Y: -401). The room can be opened by sitting on the two thrones simultaneously (or by placing objects on each throne).

Name: Shattered Flail
Description: Dropped by the Flind, 'leader' of the group of Gnolls attacking the Zhentarim caravan on The Risen Road.

Name: Speedy Reply
Description: This weapon can be found on the body of a dead caravan agent on The Risen Road, near the cave where gnolls are attacking the caravan's survivors (X:25, Y:603).

Name: Reason's Grasp
Description: Found in a locked chest in the cave where survivors of the attacked caravan are fending off a pack of gnolls on The Risen Road (X: 37 Y: 644). The chest is behind the survivors, against the cave wall.

Name: Smuggler's Ring
Description: Looted from a Skeleton, hidden in a bush on the lower path following the river, near the broken bridge section at The Risen Road (X:57, Y:514).

Name: Svartlebee's Woundseeker
Description: Carried by Gauntlet Yeva.

Name: Hamarhraft
Description: Found in a Gilded Chest in one of the burning rooms on the second floor of the inn at Waukeen's Rest (X: -84, Y:630). This chest can be difficult to get to before the room becomes completely engulfed in flames, so it's recommended to approach in Turn-Based Mode. The weapon needs to be picked up before the first long rest after coming to Waukeen's Rest for the first time. If you come to the burning room after a long rest, the weapon will be unavailable.

Name: Counsellor Florrick's Weapons
Description: Reward for rescuing Counsellor Florrick from the burning inn of Waukeen's Rest during the quest "Rescue the Grand Duke", where Counsellor Florrick offers the party a choice between three items with the shared ability names: The Sparky Points[bg3.wiki], The Joltshooter[bg3.wiki], and The Spellsparkler[bg3.wiki]

Name: Githyanki Crossbow
Description: Dropped by Raider Chost and Raider Zastri of the Githyanki Patrol in the Mountain Pass area of The Risen Road (X:-137, Y:558).

Name: Githyanki Longsword
Description: Dropped by Gish For'reth (Githyanki patrol) in the Mountain Pass area of The Risen Road (X:-137, Y:558).

Name: Githyanki Greatsword
Description: Carried by Sarth Baretha (Githyanki patrol) in the Mountain Pass area of The Risen Road at (X: -137, Y: 558).

Name: Silver Sword of the Astral Plane
Description: Can be obtained by casting Command (Drop) or Disarming Attack (Ranged) or Disarming Attack (Melee) on Kith'rak Voss during the Gith patrol scene before he flies away, though his chance of succeeding the Saving Throw is very high, or as a reward for showing the Orphic Hammer to or killing Kith'rak Voss in Chapter Three.

Name: Titanstring Bow
Description: 558 gp. (Can also be bought from Lann Tarv in the Main Floor of Moonrise Towers).

Name: Gloves of Thievery
Description: 60 gp.

Name: Harold
Description: Reward for bringing the chest to Zarys in the Zhentarim Hideout as part of Find the Missing Shipment.

Name: Abyss Beckoners
Description: Inside a locked chest in a cell, in the "office" area in the far back of Zhentarim Basement.

Name: Helmet of Smiting
Description: This helmet can be found inside a locked gilded chest in the Selûnite Outpost (X:163, Y:-248).

Name: Luminous Armour
Description: Found in a locked and trapped Opulent Chest in the Selûnite Outpost area of the Underdark (X: 176 Y: -247). The chest is behind a hidden door revealed by a Perception check, or it can be accessed by jumping from the room with the waypoint.

Name: Phalar Aluve
Description: This weapon can be found stabbed into a rock in the Underdark at coordinates (X:116, Y:-192), and can be freed by passing either a DC 15 Strength check to yank it from the stone or a DC 15 Religion check to learn how to release the magic holding it in place. Alternatively, a Cleric of Eilistraee can release the sword without needing an ability check.

Name: The Blast Pendant
Description: This amulet is worn by Dhourn, one of the petrified drow to the west of the Selûnite Outpost (X:121, Y:-245).

Name: The Spectator Eyes
Description: Looted from the Spectator located in the Underdark.

Name: Bloodguzzler Garb
Description: Dropped by the Bulette in the Underdark.

Name: Amulet of the Unworthy
Description: Carried by a Minotaur wandering the Underdark (X: 160 Y: -147).

Name: Shortsword of First Blood
Description: Found on the corpse of an executed Deep Gnome in the Underdark at (X:73, Y:-187), at the entrance of the Decrepit Village (if approaching from the Myconid Colony).

Name: Exterminator's Axe
Description: Dropped by Gekh Goal, a member of the Duergar Slave Hunters in Decrepit Village, Underdark.

Name: Explorer's Ring
Description: Explorer's Ring can be found on a skeleton atop the stones surrounding the Bibberbang field north of the Dread Hollow region of the Underdark X: -12 Y: -50. It can be reached by jumping from a series of rock ledges or by teleporting up to the location.

Name: Mourning Frost
Description: Formed by combining components carried by three Drow mages competing to discover the Adamantine Forge, found at various Underdark locations. The Icy Helve is with Dhourn west of the Selûnite Outpost, Icy Metal looted from the Pale Corpse in the Myconid Colony's secret area unlocked by completing the quest "Defeat the Duergar Intruders" (X:50, Y:75), and the Icy Crystal carried by Filro the Forgotten near the Sussur Tree.

Name: Dog Collar
Description: Found in a grave on the cliff overlooking Arcane Tower to the south of the Underdark - Sussur Tree Waypoint (On the 4th floor of the Arcane Tower, there's a button in the North-Eastern corner. When pressed, it seems inactive. However, if you wear the Dog Collar and interact with it, you'll discover it's actually a food dispenser for Lenore's pet, as it dispenses a piece of raw steak).

Name: Boots of Speed
Description: Worn by Thulla in the Myconid Colony. She gives them to you as thanks for curing her of the duergar poison in "Cure the Poisoned Gnome".

Name: Shadow of Menzoberranzan
Description: Looted from the Pale Corpse in the Myconid Colony, in the secret area unlocked by completing the quest "Defeat the Duergar Intruders" (X: 50 Y: 75).

Name: Survival Instinct
Description: Granted by completing the "Help Omeluum Investigate the Parasite" quest.

Name: Winter's Clutches
Description: "The Avenge Glut's Circle" quest reward, given by Glut upon defeating sovereign Spaw, can also be bought from Lady Esther at Rosymorn Monastery Trail or found on a counter near Sorcerous Sundries alongside a Coldbrim Hat, Gold Wyrmling Staff, and various scrolls, guarded by a Lava Elemental and Water Elemental.

Name: Sunwalker's Gift
Description: 80 gp.

Name: Ring of Mind-Shielding
Description: Offered by Omeluum at the end of "Help Omeluum Investigate the Parasite". You can purchase it either with gold, or by trading a story or information about the Nautiloid (70 gp).

Name: Pearl of Power Amulet
Description: 90 gp.

Name: Ring of Salving
Description: 80 gp.

Name: Caustic Band
Description: 80 gp.

Name: Gloves of Uninhibited Kushigo
Description: Given to you by Derryth Bonecloak in the Myconid Colony as reward for saving Baelen Bonecloak during "Find the Mushroom Picker".

Name: Drow Studded Leather Armour
Description: Inside a Heavy Chest at Lolth's Cultist's cache (X:71 Y:-220), climbing up a high spot near the entrance of The Festering Cove.

Name: Sickle of BOOOAL
Description: Dropped or pickpocketed from Pooldripp the Zealous in The Festering Cove, this weapon can also be acquired by choosing the correct dialog options when speaking to BOOOAL in The Festering Cove, causing his power to falter and agreeing to become his Chosen. Alternatively, selecting different dialog options during the cutscene allows you to eliminate BOOOAL without provoking the Kuo-toa into attacking. Once this is achieved, you can then purchase the weapon from Pooldripp the Zealous (190 gp).

Name: Slippery Chain Shirt
Description: Found in a chest hidden on a cliff in The Festering Cove (X:-400, Y:329).

Name: Helmet of Autonomy
Description: Found on a skeleton at the entrance to The Festering Cove (X:82, Y:-241).

Name: BOOOAL's Benediction
Description: Sacrifice a companion to BOOOAL in The Festering Cove.

Name: Skybreaker
Description: In a locked chest in front of the Arcane Tower in the Underdark (X:27, Y:-298).

Name: Uncovered Mysteries
Description: This amulet can be found inside a small gilded chest on the Arcane Tower's 1st floor. (Near the elevator)

Name: Mystra's Grace
Description: These boots can be found in the Chest of the Mundane on the northern balcony of the Arcane Tower's third floor, the same level as the arcane turrets (X: -36 Y: 265).

Name: Mage's Friend
Description: This ring can be found in a chest at the foot of the bed on the 4th floor of the Arcane Tower.

Name: Guiding Light
Description: This ring can be obtained in the Arcane Tower by telling Bernard the appropriate play line. Bernard will place the ring on a nearby table, where the ring can be taken. Alternatively, it can be looted from Bernard after defeating it.

Name: Light of Creation
Description: Dropped by Bernard on the top floor of the Arcane Tower in the Underdark.

Name: Club of Hill Giant Strength
Description: Found by breaking the Stool of Hill Giant Strength on the highest floor of Arcane Tower, with Bernard. The stool is underneath the thatched roof section and is knocked over on its side.

Name: Staff of Arcane Blessing
Description: This staff is discovered leaning against a table in the basement of the Arcane Tower, which can be accessed by wearing the Guiding Light. The ring serves to activate a concealed button on the tower's teleporter pad, granting access to the basement. Alternatively, you can reach the Arcane Tower's basement by ascending the stairs behind the generator, utilizing Feather Fall, and leaping down into the gap between the wall and the wooden staircase.

Name: The Sparkswall
Description: This ring can be found in a gilded chest in the Arcane Tower's basement. Guiding Light is required to access the basement.

Name: Shining Staver-of-Skulls
Description: Can be looted from or sold by Corsair Greymon, a duergar on the Ebon Lake boat to Grymforge. Greymon can be found in the main chamber, if not killed on the boat.

Name: Bow of the Banshee
Description: Can be looted from or sold by Corsair Greymon. Greymon is first encountered when taking the boat found in the Decrepit Village to Grymforge. If he survives the journey, Greymon will be in Grymforge among the other Duergar.

Name: Jorgoral's Greatsword
Description: Looted from Corsair Greymon in Ebon Lake, Grymforge.

Name: Intransigent Warhammer
Description: Can be found inside a Watertight Chest.

Name: Infernal Alloy
Description: Can be acquired from Stonemason Kith by passing three checks (History, Investigation, and Perception) during conversation. If these checks fail, the alloy can also be obtained by killing or purchasing it from Kith.

Name: Dark Justiciar Mail
Description: Looted from a skeleton near the Grymforge Ancient Rune Circle in Grymforge at (X: -655, Y: 424), and south of the Ancient Forge Ancient Rune Circle in Grymforge at (X: -609, Y: 246).

Name: Sharran Crossbow
Description: Found in a locked chest in Grymforge at (X: -677, Y: 398). When picking it up from the chest, the player needs to pass a DC 10 Intelligence Saving Throw to recognize that it's actually a Sharran Crossbow.

Name: The Real Sparky Sparkswall
Description: Obtained from a locked and trapped chest in Grymforge (X: -695 Y: 420).

Name: Armour of Uninhibited Kushigo
Description: "Find the Missing Boots" optional quest reward by Sergeant Thrinn in Grymforge after giving her Boots of Speed.

Name: Bracing Band
Description: "Find the Missing Boots" optional quest reward by Sergeant Thrinn in Grymforge after giving her Boots of Speed.

Name: Fetish of Callarduran Smoothhands
Description: Found on one of the dead deep gnomes that a pair of duergar are throwing into the lake in Grymforge (X:-610, Y:408). Succeeding on a Perception check while talking to the Duergar is required before this item can be looted.

Name: Wondrous Gloves
Description: Dropped by a mimic disguised as a chest in Grymforge (X: -691 Y: 374).

Name: Deep Delver
Description: Dropped by Elder Brithvar in Grymforge (X:-631, Y:326).

Name: Disintegrating Night Walkers
Description: Dropped by Nere in Grymforge.

Name: Sword of Screams
Description: Dropped by Nere in Grymforge.

Name: Ring of Absolute Force
Description: Dropped by Sergeant Thrinn in Grymforge.

Name: Cap of Wrath
Description: Dropped by Thudd in Grymforge.

Name: The Protecty Sparkswall
Description: Looted from a Gilded Chest at the end of the trapped bridge in Grymforge (X: -645 Y: 360).

Name: Dark Justiciar Helm
Description: The skeletal remains of Dark Justiciars in Grymforge, north of the Underdark - Grymforge Ancient Rune Circle.

Name: Dark Justiciar Mask
Description: Looted from a skeleton in Grymforge near the Ancient Forge Waypoint (X: -606 Y: 282).

Name: Merregon Halberd
Description: Dropped by a Merregon Legionnaire in the hallway with the Hellsboars in Grymforge at (X: 575, Y: 377), and two halberds can be found lying around the edge of the lava lake in Grymforge at (X: -643, Y: 215), and (X: -601, Y: 199).

Name: Firestoker
Description: Found in an Opulent Chest in Grymforge in the hallway with the Hellsboars (X:-574, Y:382).

Name: Sentient Amulet
Description: In a locked Adamantine Chest, on an island in lava, near the Lava Elemental in Grymforge (X:-624, Y:224).

Name: Envoy's Amulet
Description: Reward for delivering Nere's Head to Spaw during the quest "Deliver Nere's Head".

Name: Champion's Chain
Description: Reward for delivering Nere's Head to Glut during the quest "Deliver Nere's Head".

Name: Mithral Ore
Description: Mithral Ore is an ingredient found from one of two Ore Veins in Abandoned Refuge. The first is located northeast of the Adamantine Forge, across some lava, against the cavern wall at (X: -556, Y: 277). The second can be found northwest of Abandoned Refuge, also across some lava, next to a cliff at (X: -642, Y: 253).

Name: Longsword Mould
Description: Longsword Mould found in Grymforge on an overhanging metal bridge at (X: -626, Y: 406), accessed via northmost stairs. Used to craft Adamantine Longsword[bg3.wiki].

Name: Mace Mould
Description: The Mace Mould, used for crafting an Adamantine Mace[bg3.wiki], can be found in Grymforge near the Ancient Forge Waypoint at (X: -614, Y: 283).

Name: Scale Mail Mould
Description: The Scale Mail Mould, used to craft Adamantine Scale Mail[bg3.wiki], is located in Grymforge near the Ancient Forge Waypoint on the floor next to a standing torch at (X: -618, Y: 264).

Name: Splint Mould
Description: The Splint Mould, used to craft Adamantine Splint Armor[bg3.wiki], is found in Grymforge near the Ancient Forge Waypoint on a rock ledge overlooking lava pools at (X: -593, Y: 311).

Name: Scimitar Mould
Description: The Scimitar Mould is found on a skeleton in Grymforge, on a ruined stairwell with two levers at (X: -604, Y: 322), overlooking the rubble that has trapped Nere. The stairwell is above ground level, and jumping or spells like Misty Step are useful in reaching this location. It is used to craft the Adamantine Scimitar[bg3.wiki].

Name: Shield Mould
Description: The Shield Mould is found on a Skeleton at Grymforge, located at the very top of the stairs in the Dormitory near the room with the Merregon Legionnaire and the Hellsboars (X: -560, Y: 410), and it's used to craft an Adamantine Shield[bg3.wiki].

Name: Grymskull Helm
Description: Dropped by Grym in The Adamantine Forge.

Name: Holy Lance Helm
Description: Found in a chest in Rosymorn Monastery (X: 120 Y: 35).

Name: Ceremonial Longsword
Description: The Ceremonial Longsword is found in the stained glass room; leave it where it is.

Name: Ceremonial Warhammer
Description: This weapon can be found at Rosymorn Monastery in the Giant Eagle's nest at (X: 80, Y: 44). Place the Ceremonial Warhammer on the Northeast altar to obtain Dawnmaster Seed.

Name: Ceremonial Battleaxe
Description: Found in one of the dormitories in the Rosymorn Monastery, guarded by a Guardian of Faith. Place the Ceremonial Battleaxe onto the Southwest altar for Dawnmaster Vaseid.

Name: Ceremonial Mace
Description: Found on a random kobold in the Rosymorn Monastery Firewine storage room, this Ceremonial Mace should be placed onto the Southeast altar for Dawnmaster Stockhold.

Name: Amulet of Branding
Description: Can be looted from A'jak'nir Jeera (X: 1383 Y: -812) in Crèche Y'llek.

Name: Awakened
Description: Make the Zaith'isk in the infirmary of Crèche Y'llek explode and succeed at all three saving throws. The saves are significantly easier if you are in the device rather than Lae'zel. The person that gets the buff is always the player character.

Name: Aberration Hunters' Amulet
Description: Dropped by Ghustil Stornugoss in Crèche Y'llek.

Name: Githyanki Shortsword
Description: Dropped by Ghustil Stornugoss, Ardent Kur'ashk and Ardent Jhe'rezath in Crèche Y'llek.

Name: Ring of Elemental Infusion
Description: Looted from Gish Umr'a'ac in Infirmary, Crèche Y'llek.

Name: Soulbreaker Greatsword
Description: Looted from Kith'rak Therezzyn in Captain's Quarters, Crèche Y'llek.

Name: Circlet of Psionic Revenge
Description: Inside a chest in Inquisitor's Chamber, Crèche Y'llek.

Name: Diadem of Arcane Synergy
Description: Looted from Ardent Jhe'rezath in Inquisitor's Chamber, Crèche Y'llek.

Name: Strange Conduit Ring
Description: Inside a chest in Inquisitor's Chamber, Crèche Y'llek.

Name: Gloves of Belligerent Skies
Description: Inside a locked chest in the Inquisitor's Chamber of Crèche Y'llek.

Name: The Skinburster
Description: In the eastern alcove in the Inquisitor's Chamber, Crèche Y'llek.

Name: Hoarfrost Boots
Description: Inside a cabinet in Inquisitor's Chamber, Crèche Y'llek.

Name: Crossbow of Arcane Force
Description: Carried by Raider G'r'ath in Crèche Y'llek.

Name: Ring of Arcane Synergy
Description: Can be looted from Gish Far'Aag in Crèche Y'llek.

Name: Varsh Ko'kuu's Boots
Description: Acquired from Varsh Ko'kuu in the Hatchery of Crèche Y'llek. The player must either kill him, or persuade him to hand over the egg, by promising to take responsibility for it.

Name: Necklace of Elemental Augmentation
Description: Inside a display case in the Inquisitor's chamber at (X: 1379 Y: -662). Also, on a shipwrecked ship located Northwest of South Span Checkpoint at (X: -97 Y: 107) in Wyrm's Crossing, you can find another item inside a Traveller's Chest.

Name: The Blood of Lathander
Description: In the western hallway at (X:1330, Y:-660), there are two statues that need to be rotated: the one to the south requires an Athletics check to move and should be turned west, while the other should be turned east. This action opens a path in the wall with some barrels that can be jumped over or destroyed. Proceed west to reach the Secret Stairway. Use ranged attacks to destroy the Energy Source crystal on the south side of the barrier, then climb the rocks to access the next area. In the following room, there's a Dawnbreaker that emits pulses to knock the party away. Wait for breaks in the pulses to approach and disarm it (DC 14). Unfortunately, the path forward is still blocked. Move to some rocks, climb them, and follow the path to locate another energy source at (X:1118, Y:-790). The final energy source is situated on the northern rocks. Avoid the Dawnbreaker's pulses and consider disarming it to easily destroy the Energy Source. Proceeding onward, the party eventually encounters the Blood of Lathander. If the Dawnmaster's Crest has been obtained, simply place it in the altar's item slot to safely acquire the Blood of Lathander. Placing the crest after taking the mace also deactivates the trap. If the Blood of Lathander is taken without the Dawnmaster's Crest, it triggers a deadly trap that jeopardizes the Monastery's destruction. The party has only four turns to either escape the Monastery or dismantle the four Lathander Solar Machines that activate the trap.

Name: Voss' Silver Sword
Description: Carried by Kith'rak Voss, can be confronted late into Act 1 or during Act 2. Can be purchased from Voss when engaging in conversation with him in Act 3.

Name: Moonlantern
Description: One can be found in Balthazar's room in Moonrise Towers, while another can be looted from Kar'niss in the Ruined Battlefield.

Name: Luminous Gloves
Description: The Luminous Gloves are found inside the Potter's Chest in the Ruined Battlefield accessible by jumping. (X: -52 Y: 11).

Name: Gloomstrand Shield
Description: Found in a locked chest south of the Tollhouse at (X: -60 Y: -114) in the Ruined Battlefield.

Name: Frost Prince
Description: Looted from a Gilded Chest in the southeast portion of the Ruined Battlefield (X: 80 Y: -96), near an ambush of Shadow-Cursed Needle Blights and Shadow-Cursed Vine Blights.

Name: Thermoarcanic Gloves
Description: These gloves can be looted from Kansif. He can be found in the following locations at The Ruined Battlefield (X: 4 Y: -28) while accompanying the Harpers from the Last Light Inn on an ambush.

Name: Cruel Sting
Description: Loot from Kar'niss in Shadow-Cursed Lands.

Name: Hammergrim Mist Amulet
Description: Located in a locked chest tucked away in ruined house in the Shadow-Cursed Lands, just east of the tollhouse. (X: -12 Y: -7)

Name: Ring of Shadows
Description: Hide and Seek quest reward by Oliver, House with Flowers in Shadow-Cursed Lands. Can also be obtained by knocking him out or through pick-pocketing at the exact moment the encounter becomes a tactical turn based encounter and before he vanishes or if you can see invisible creatures.

Name: Ring of Mental Inhibition
Description: Can be found inside a locked chest in the Ruined Battlefield (X: 76 Y: 40), of the Shadow-Cursed Lands, just east of the Shadowed Battlefield Waypoint.

Name: Ironwood Club
Description: Dropped by the Shadow-Cursed Shambling Mound (X: 40 Y: 60) in the Ruined Battlefield.

Name: Ring of Self Immolation
Description: Can be looted from a locked Wooden Chest in the Ruined Battlefield (X: 25 Y: 63). If needed, the key is nearby on a skeleton, alongside a note.

Name: Family Ring
Description: The ring can be found in a hole among rocks by following blood tracks, behind a camp in Ruined Battlefield (X:108 Y:128).

Name: Shadow-Cloaked Ring
Description: Can be looted from the Shadow Mastiff Alpha in the Ruined Battlefield (X: -49 Y: 36). The nearby everburning torches must be destroyed before the Mastiff will appear.

Name: Ring of Twilight
Description: The Ring of Twilight is found inside a Traveller's Chest hidden behind some pots inside a ruined tower in the Ruined Battlefield (X: -34 Y: -12).

Name: Raven Gloves
Description: Given by He Who Was for completing "Punish the Wicked".

Name: Flawed Helldusk Armour
Description: Flawed Helldusk Armour is obtained by giving Dammon an Infernal Alloy in the Last Light Inn.

Name: Flawed Helldusk Helmet
Description: This item is obtained by giving Dammon in the Last Light Inn a piece of Infernal Iron.

Name: Flawed Helldusk Gloves
Description: Dammon in the Last Light Inn will craft this item if he is given an Infernal Iron.

Name: Evasive Shoes
Description: 95 gp.

Name: Acrobat Shoes
Description: 35 gp.

Name: Ring of Geniality
Description: 40 gp.

Name: Hat of Fire Acuity
Description: Only obtainable by defeating the Strange Ox at the Last Light Inn or Rivington; if defeated at the Druid Grove, it won't drop the item.

Name: Snowburst Ring
Description: Found tucked away inside a loose plank (Perception check required to spot), in the inn of the Last Light Inn (X: -80 Y: 158).

Name: Coruscation Ring
Description: Found in a trapped Heavy Chest in the cellar (X: 47 Y: -738) of Last Light Inn, this chest is in a secret area, which is reached by going through a set of Double Oak Doors blocked by a destructible spiderweb and a pile of crates. The room beyond has a Cracked Wall that, when broken, grants access to the secret area containing the chest.

Name: Covert Cowl
Description: Carried by a Meenlock creature in the Cellar of Last Light Inn.

Name: Shifting Corpus Ring
Description: Dropped by Flaming Fist Marcus at the Last Light Inn.

Name: Jhannyl's Gloves
Description: Can be looted from Isobel.

Name: Moon Devotion Robe
Description: Can be looted from Isobel.

Name: Potent Robe
Description: Reward for successfully completing Rescue the Tieflings in Act Two.

Name: Penumbral Armour
Description: Found in a locked chest in the abandoned house by the river just east of the Last Light Inn at (X:33, Y:145).

Name: Rippling Force Mail
Description: Can be found in a locked Rustic Chest on the second floor of Dammon's blacksmith in the Last Light Inn (X: -20 Y: 179).

Name: Shield of Scorching Reprisal
Description: Looted from a Flaming Fist's corpse (X: -3 Y: 215) directly east of the "Open Graves" beyond the northern bridge near the Last Light Inn. Successful Perception check needed to detect some rubble. Strength check is then needed to smash the rubble to find the body.

Name: Sylvan Scimitar
Description: This weapon is held by Jaheira. It can be obtained by killing and looting her, or recruiting her.

Name: Icebite Robe
Description: Icebite Robe is found inside a sarcophagus in the Shadow-Cursed Lands, (X: -158 Y: 73).

Name: True Love's Caress
Description: This ring can be found on a skeleton leaning up against a large tree in the Shadow-Cursed Lands (X: -147 Y: 43).

Name: True Love's Embrace
Description: Can be found on a skeleton laying on a mattress on the ground on the House of Healing (X: -212 Y: 0).

Name: Helmet of Arcane Acuity
Description: Can be found in a locked and trapped Gilded Chest in a secret area of the Reithwin Mason's Guild Basement (X: 107 Y: -758). The basement is accessed through a trapdoor in the Mason's Guild, and the secret area can be opened by lockpicking or using the Tower-Shaped Key on the Keyholed Herald (X: 123 Y: -688).

Name: Poisoner's Gloves
Description: Found inside a chest at the back end of the House of Healing (X: -199 Y: 78).

Name: Surgeon's Subjugation Amulet
Description: Worn by Malus Thorm at the House of Healing.

Name: Artificial Leech
Description: Dropped by Sister Geanne.

Name: Syringe
Description: Dropped by Sister Anya.

Name: Trepan
Description: Dropped by Sister Vanessa.

Name: Bonesaw
Description: Dropped by Sister Hunna.

Name: Ritual Dagger of Shar
Description: Ritual Dagger of Shar is found on an altar (X: 249 Y: -847) in the Sharran Sanctuary inside Reithwin Town.

Name: Twist of Fortune
Description: Twist of Fortune is obtained by defeating and looting Gerringothe Thorm in the Reithwin Tollhouse.

Name: Ironvine Shield
Description: Looted from a chest in Reithwin Tollhouse (X: -127 Y: -95).

Name: Gloves of Battlemage's Power
Description: Found in an Opulent Chest in the Reithwin Tollhouse (X: -84 Y: -88) on the second floor in the room with two locked doors.

Name: Fireheart
Description: Located inside a Heavy Chest inside the Reithwin Tollhouse (X: -127 Y: -78). The player must break a vine or jump from the outside through a window to enter in this hidden room.

Name: Rat Bat
Description: The Rat Bat can be found leaning against a wall in The Waning Moon (X: -224 Y: -78).

Name: Ichorous Gloves
Description: Found inside a metal chest in the storeroom at the back of The Waning Moon (X: -253 Y: 71).

Name: Punch-Drunk Bastard
Description: Can be looted from a chest in the back storage room of The Waning Moon.

Name: Watcher's Shield
Description: Found on one of a pair of skeletons along the cliffs west of the House of Healing (X: -250 Y: 36).

Name: Assassin's Shortsword
Description: Found on one of a pair of skeletons along the cliffs west of the House of Healing (X:-252, Y:36).

Name: Shar's Temptation
Description: This amulet is inside a crate with a note on top, inside the House of Healing (X: -193 Y: 9).

Name: Lightning Jabber
Description: Looted from the Kuo-Toa chief in the Kuo-Toa ambush North East of the Grand Mausoleum entrance.

Name: Boots of Apparent Death
Description: Boots of Apparent Death are found inside a sarcophagus in the Shadow-Cursed Lands, (X: -165 Y: 45).

Name: Firzu's Ring of Trading
Description: On a charred corpse (X: 82 Y: -1006) in the hiddem room immediately south of the entrance hall of the House of Healing Morgue.

Name: Strange Tendril Amulet
Description: Looted from a Wooden Chest (X: 85 Y: -1007) inside a hidden room near the main entrance of the House of Healing Morgue.

Name: Bided Time
Description: Found in a dead researcher's locked chest in House of Healing Morgue.

Name: Eversight Ring
Description: Looted from Opulent Chest in the House of Healing Morgue at (X: 9, Y: -981).

Name: Fleshmelter Cloak
Description: Looted from a Gilded Chest in the House of Healing Morgue in the left side of the pit.

Name: Protective Plate
Description: Looted from Animated Armour at the bottom of the pit in House of Healing Morgue.

Name: Poisoner's Ring
Description: 40 gp.

Name: Ring of Spiteful Thunder
Description: 40 gp.

Name: Marksmanship Hat
Description: 24 gp.

Name: Fistbreaker Helm
Description: 63 gp.

Name: Hat of Storm Scion's Power
Description: 90 gp.

Name: Potion of Everlasting Vigour
Description: Convince Astarion to bite Araj Oblodra.

Name: Vivacious Cloak
Description: Can be looted from a chest (X: -257 Y: -886) in the Grand Mausoleum.

Name: Circle of Bones
Description: Can be looted from Balthazar in the Gauntlet of Shar (X: -845 Y: -793).

Name: Callous Glow ring
Description: Contained inside an Opulent Chest in the vault room near Balthazar, inside the Gauntlet of Shar, (X: -821 Y: -752).

Name: Least Expected
Description: Looted from a Gilded Chest in the Gauntlet of Shar (X: -730 Y: -800).

Name: Justiciar's Scimitar
Description: Looted from Lyrthindor in the Gauntlet of Shar. Lyrthindor is involved in the quest "Break Yurgir's Contract". He can be found at the foot of the large statue of Shar (X: -713 Y: -732), though you must first speak with and follow the rats to this location in order to find him.

Name: Justiciar's Greatshield
Description: Looted from Lyrthindor in the Gauntlet of Shar. Lyrthindor is involved in the quest "Break Yurgir's Contract". He can be found at the foot of the large statue of Shar (X: -713 Y: -732), though you must first speak with and follow the rats to this location in order to find him.

Name: Hellfire Hand Crossbow
Description: Can be looted from Yurgir (X: -653 Y: -764).

Name: Dark Justiciar Gauntlets (Uncommon)
Description: Found laying on a pile of boxes in the Gauntlet of Shar (X: -660 Y: -760), near Yurgir.

Name: Boots of Brilliance
Description: Looted from a Heavy Chest in the room just north of Yurgir in the Gauntlet of Shar (X: -632 Y: -723).

Name: Killer's Sweetheart
Description: Found laying on the ground at the top of the stone structure in the Self-Same Trial inside the Gauntlet of Shar (X: -833 Y: -729).

Name: Spear of Night
Description: Found resting on a shine in the Silent Library, inside the Gauntlet of Shar (X: -820 Y: -756).

Name: Dark Justiciar Half-Plate (Rare)
Description: Found laying on the ground next to the altar where the Spear of Night rests, in the Gauntlet of Shar (X: -818 Y: -755).

Name: Dark Justiciar Helmet
Description: Found inside a Gilded Chest in the Gauntlet of Shar (X: -822 Y: -753).

Name: Moonlight Glaive
Description: Reward for the quest The Chosen of Shar, for convincing Shadowheart to free Nightsong in the Shadowfell.

Name: Dark Justiciar Half-Plate (Very Rare)
Description: Reward for the quest The Chosen of Shar, for convincing Shadowheart to kill the Nightsong in the Shadowfell.

Name: Dark Justiciar Gauntlets (Rare)
Description: Reward for the quest The Chosen of Shar, for convincing Shadowheart to kill the Nightsong in the Shadowfell.

Name: Dark Justiciar Boots
Description: Reward for the quest The Chosen of Shar, for convincing Shadowheart to kill the Nightsong in the Shadowfell.

Name: Shar's Spear of Evening
Description: Reward for the quest The Chosen of Shar, for convincing Shadowheart to kill the Nightsong in the Shadowfell.

Name: Derivation Cloak
Description: Can be looted from a Heavy Chest (X: -132 Y: -175) in Balthazar's chambers on the First Floor of Moonrise Towers.

Name: Coldbrim Hat
Description: Discovered in a locked chest within a concealed chamber behind a bookcase in Balthazar's Chambers on the First Floor of Moonrise Towers, and also found on a table near the Lava Elemental at Sorcerous Sundries.

Name: Absolute's Protector
Description: Dropped by Z'rell in Moonrise Towers.

Name: Spellcrux Amulet
Description: Looted from The Warden in Moonrise Towers Prison (X: 569 Y: -650).

Name: Browbeaten Circlet
Description: On a table up the ladder in the Moonrise Towers Prison Warden's room (X:575, Y:-647).

Name: Wulbren's Hammer
Description: On a table up the ladder in the Moonrise Towers Prison Warden's room (X:575, Y:-647).

Name: Myrkulite Scourge
Description: Can be obtained from the following sources within Moonrise Towers: Radija on the First Floor, Susdera on the Rooftop, and Kressa Bonedaughter in the Mind Flayer Colony Barracks.

Name: Ring of Exalted Marrow
Description: Can be looted from a Heavy Chest on the Moonrise Towers Rooftop (X: -153 Y: -170).

Name: Cloak of Elemental Absorption
Description: Can be looted from an Opulent Chest (X: -170 Y: -171) in Ketheric Thorm's chambers on the First Floor of Moonrise Towers.

Name: Shadow Lantern
Description: To access Balthazar's hidden room in Moonrise Towers when Gale is in the party, interact with the top right Protruding Book and insert one of the human hearts from the room into the small Ancient Altar. Within the hidden room, interact with the ritual circle with Gale and combine a Dead Pixie with a Broken Moonlantern.

Name: Spineshudder Amulet
Description: Looted from the Mimic (X: -171 Y: -195) in the bedroom on the upper floor.

Name: Argument Solver
Description: Dropped by Mig in the Moonrise Towers.

Name: Infernal Rapier
Description: Potential reward during Wyll's companion quest, The Blade of Frontiers, at the end of Chapter Two. Bring Wyll along when enterring the Mind Flayer Colony, free Zariel's asset, then pass a DC 14 Persuasion Check to successfully ask for a reward.

Name: Summon Us
Description: If freed during the Prologue, Us will be found locked in a cage by Chop, in the Mind Flayer Colony (X: 663 Y: -74).

Name: Blade of Oppressed Souls
Description: Looted from area unlocked by the Necrotic Laboratory puzzle in the Mind Flayer Colony.

Name: Circlet of Mental Anguish
Description: Can be looted from a skeleton in the Necrotic Labratory of the Mind Flayer Colony (X: 748 Y: -141).

Name: Braindrain Gloves
Description: Can be looted from a skeleton in the Necrotic Labratory of the Mind Flayer Colony (X: 748 Y: -141).

Name: Githzerai Mind Barrier
Description: Insert the Waking Mind (found at X:750, Y:-139 after the brain connect puzzle in the Mind Flayer Colony) into the nearby Mind-Archive Interface, speak to the Slack-Skinned Head, and agree to purge its mind.

Name: Ketheric's Warhammer
Description: Looted from Ketheric Thorm.

Name: Reaper's Embrace
Description: Looted from Ketheric Thorm.

Name: Ketheric's Shield
Description: Looted from Ketheric Thorm.

Name: Shadow Blade Ring
Description: Reward for completing the quest Find Arabella's Parents.

Name: Arabella's Shadow Entangle
Description: Reward for completing the quest Find Arabella's Parents.

Name: Psionic Ward Armour
Description: Looted from Ch'r'ai Tska'an in Reithwin Town near the bridge leading to the To Baldur's Gate waypoint.

Name: Hr'a'cknir Bracers
Description: Looted from Ch'r'ai Tska'an in Reithwin Town near the bridge leading to the To Baldur's Gate waypoint.

Name: Devotee's Mace
Description: Rewarded from the "Arm Thy Servant" option of Divine Intervention. (Cleric Level 10 Reward).

Name: Selûne's Spear of Night
Description: Reward for sparing the Nightsong during Shadowheart's personal quest, The Chosen of Shar. This spear is granted after completing Infiltrate Moonrise Towers, upon speaking to Dame Aylin in camp for the first time.

Name: Boots of Uninhibited Kushigo
Description: Dropped by Prelate Lir'i'c.

Name: Astral-Touched Tadpole
Description: Awarded by The Emperor at the beginning of Act Three.

Name: Garb of the Land and Sky
Corpsegrinder
Description: Looted from Stone Lord Agents northwest of the Open Hand Temple (X: -210 Y: 99).

Name: Tasha's Hideous Laughter
Description: Carry the Sentient Amulet from Grymforge to a casket under the Open Hand Temple in Wyrm's Crossing, completing Help the Cursed Monk. Must choose to accept the curse yourself.

Name: Stillmaker
Description: Found in a hole (X: 67 Y: -1018) in the area underneath the Open Hand Temple. A successful DC5 Perception check is needed to spot it. The hole is just at the top of the cragged rock and can be easy to miss. There is blood right next to the hole.

Name: Gleamdance Dagger
Description: Looted from the body of Farlin in one the beaches and in Sharess' Caress.

Name: Amulet of the Drunkard
Description: Sold by Hoots Hooligan in Sharess' Caress, found in Wyrm's Crossing.

Name: Bonespike Boots
Description: Looted from a trapped Wooden Chest (X: -1340 Y: -857) in a secluded Passageway (X: -233 Y: 84) at the far end of the western trail leading away from the South Span Checkpoint in Rivington.

Name: Ring of Truthfulnesss
Description: Dropped by Mind Flayer hiding in the Windmill Basement of the Abandoned Windmill (X: 44 Y: -38).

Name: Ring of Blink
Description: Steal from or persuade the tressym, Tara, on the roof of the Open Hand Temple (X: -45 Y: -5). Easily done with Gale in your party.

Name: The Undead Bane
Description: Carried by Ulma in the Gur Camp.

Name: Absolute Confidence Amulet
Description: Reward for initiating conversation with Naaber multiple times until the option is exhausted in Carm's Garm at Wyrm's Crossing (X: 20 Y: 130).

Name: Seemingly Gleaming Ring
Description: An alternate reward for talking to Naaber, if the Absolute Confidence Amulet was pickpocketed from him. Carm's Garm (X: 20 Y: 130).

Name: Seraphic Pugilist Gloves
Description: Can be found in the southern most locked chest at the foot of the beds at the west end of the Open Hand Temple. Location: (X:-90, Y:-7).

Name: Tarnished Ring
Description: To craft it, merge the Ringless Gem (available from Ferg Drogher at (X: 45 Y: -98) or through pickpocketing) with the Gemless Ring (found on the Refugee Corpse at (X: 46 Y: 66) in northeastern Rivington).

Name: Orphic Hammer
Description: The Orphic Hammer can be obtained by making a deal with Raphael as part of the quest "Deal with the Devil" at Sharess' Caress. If a deal was not made with Raphael, the hammer can instead be stolen from the Archive within the House of Hope.

Name: Comeback Handaxe
Description: Won as a consolation prize from Akabi's Wheel of Fortune.

Name: Unlucky Thief's Gloves
Description: Won as a consolation prize from Akabi's Wheel of Fortune.

Name: Reverse Rain Cloak
Description: Won as a consolation prize from Akabi's Wheel of Fortune.

Name: Staff of a Mumbling Wizard
Description: Won as a consolation prize from Akabi's Wheel of Fortune.

Name: Djinni Ring
Description: Can be looted, pickpocketed, or obtained through trading from Akabi.

Name: Boots of Very Fast Blinking
Description: Prize reward from Akabi, the Djinni.

Name: Clown Hammer
Description: Looted from Dribbles.

Name: Spellmight Gloves
Description: Rewarded by Lucretious at the end of the 'Find Dribbles the Clown' questline. Alternatively, can be pickpocketed or looted from Lucretious.

Name: The Pointy Hat
Description: In a chest behind Lucretious.

Name: Hollow's Staff
Description: Can be looted from Lucretious.

Name: Dark Displacement Gloves
Description: Can be bought, pickpocketed, or looted from Popper (160 gp).

Name: Bless
Description: Pay Boney 5000 gold to construct a statue of yourself.

Name: Band of the Mystic Scoundrel
Description: Looted from a backpack (X: 1566 Y: -1522) in the Jungle.

Name: Nyrulna
Description: It is found at 'Jungle' in a DC 20 locked Painted Chest (X: -1511, Y: -1522), right next to the exit portal.

Name: Slinging Shoes
Description: Sold by Tara in the Lower City, she can be found on the roof of Highberry's Home (the house hosting the Wine Festival) at (X: -1 Y: -39); Tara only accepts Fish and/or magical items in exchange for this item.

Name: Unwanted Masterwork Gauntlets
Description: Looted from a chest in the basement of the Forge of the Nine (X: 393 Y: 763).

Name: Unwanted Masterwork Greaves
Description: Looted from a chest in the basement of the Forge of the Nine (X: 393 Y: 763).

Name: Unwanted Masterwork Scalemail
Description: Looted from a chest in the basement of the Forge of the Nine (X: 393 Y: 763).

Name: Infernal Mace
Description: Looted from several Bhaal cultists throughout Chapter 3, including those found in the Steel Watch Foundry and at Felogyr's Fireworks.

Name: Scarlet Leather Armour
Description: You can find it in the Shabby Wardrobe in Ffion Goldgrind's room, located at (X: -14 Y: 75) in Wyrm's Crossing, or you can loot it from Dolor the assassin, who can be found at the Wine Festival (X: 18 Y: -36) in the Lower City of Baldur's Gate.

Name: Spaceshunt Boots
Description: Can be looted from Dolor the assassin, found at the Wine Festival (X: 18 Y: -36) in the Lower City of Baldur's Gate.

Name: Dolor Amarus
Description: Dropped by Dolor at the Wine Festival (X: 18 Y: -36) in the Lower City, it is also sold by Echo of Abazigal in the Murder Tribunal after the player character accepts Bhaal and becomes an Unholy Assassin.

Name: Staff of Interruption
Description: Given by Mayrina after you finish the quest "Help the Hag Survivors".

Name: Belm
Description: Found in an Opulent Chest (X: -1572 Y: 976) in Jaheira's Basement under Elerrathin's Home in the Lower City. The chest is in a room behind a DC18 locked bookcase (X: -1562 Y: 980).

Name: Staff of the Ram
Description: Found in an Opulent Chest (X: -1572 Y: 976) in Jaheira's Hideout Basement under Elerrathin's Home in the Lower City. The chest is in a room behind a DC18 locked bookcase (X: -1562 Y: 980).

Name: Khalid's Gift
Description: In a display case in Jaheira's Basement.

Name: Hammer of the Just
Description: Looted from the Offerings to Tyr Chest in the basement of Stormshore Tabernacle in Lower City. The basement can be reached by entering the secret hatch in the corner of the tabernacle.

Name: Amulet of the Devout
Description: Looted from the main Offering Chest in the basement of Stormshore Tabernacle. Enter the Ornate Wooden Hatch at (X: 105 Y: -26).

Name: Shield of Shielding
Description: Looted from the main Offering Chest in the basement of Stormshore Tabernacle. Enter the Ornate Wooden Hatch at (X: 105 Y: -26).

Name: Katana
Description: Lying on a table in Golbraith's Cellar, which can be accessed through a hatch in Golbraith's House (X: -152 Y: -55) which is right next to a manhole in the Lower City that leads to the Lower City Sewers.

Name: Kurwin's Cauteriser
Description: Looted from Bugthimble in Baldur's Gate Graveyard.

Name: Abdel's Trusted Shield
Description: Rewarded from Golbraith in the upper level of his home (X: -148 Y: -60) in the Lower City, after convincing him of your courage against Mind Flayers.

Name: Til Death Do Us Part
Description: Pickpocket it off Lady Jannath in Lady Jannath's Estate.

Name: Unflinching Protector Amulet
Description: Looted from Ptaris in The Lodge Basement Docks under the Society of Brilliance Lodge.

Name: Wavemother's Cloak
Description: Looted from a chest in Water Queen's House (X: -248 Y: -249) in the Lower City of Baldur's Gate.

Name: Wavemother's Robe
Description: Finish the quest "Avenge the Drowned".

Name: Keepsake Ring
Description: Can be found on the floor of the Elfsong Tavern Basement (X: -859 Y: 531).

Name: Boots of Psionic Movement
Description: Looted from Ch'r'ai Har'rak in Knights of the Shield Hideout.

Name: Sword of the Emperor
Description: Found during the quest Visit the Emperor's Old Hideout under the Elfsong Tavern.

Name: Cerebral Citadel Armour
Description: Located inside the Hidden Room in the Elfsong Tavern Basement (X: 728 Y: 588).

Name: Cerebral Citadel Gloves
Description: Located inside the Hidden Room in the Elfsong Tavern Basement (X: 728 Y: 588).

Name: Murderous Cut
Description: Looted from several Bhaal cultists throughout Chapter 3.

Name: Cindermoth Cloak
Description: Can be looted from Aelis Siryasius at (X: -123 Y: 834).

Name: Magic Amulet
Description: Given by Sarin in the Lower City Sewers after you return their skull.

Name: Hood of the Weave
Description: 70 gp.

Name: Staff of Cherished Necromancy
Description: Can be looted from Mystic Carrion.

Name: Crypt Lord Ring
Description: Rewarded for completion of "Find Mystic Carrion's Servant" if Thrumbo survives.

Name: Torch of Revocation
Description: Dropped by Mystic Carrion, given as a potential reward for Find Mystic Carrion's Servant, or sold by him through dialogue for 3000 gold. Can also be stolen from the locked chest behind him.

Name: Despair of Athkatla
Description: Looted from Lorroakan in Ramazith's Tower.

Name: Shelter of Athkatla
Description: Looted from Lorroakan in Ramazith's Tower.

Name: Foebreaker
Description: Can be found in a hidden chest in the Karsus section of Lorroakan's Vault.

Name: Pyroquickness Hat
Description: Can be found in the Sorcerous Vault inside Sorcerous Sundries, in the vault of Elminster. It is inside an invisible chest. See Invisibility or Faerie Fire can be used to see the chest.

Name: Robe of the Weave
Description: Located inside an Globe of Invulnerability in Ramazith's Tower during Act Three. (Use See Invisibility to see the lever and disable the globe)

Name: Hellfire Greataxe
Description: In the Illusion section of Sorcerous Sundries' Sorcerous Vault, you can find it in a chest. Once inside the vault, locate the doors with names, proceed through the 'Silverhand' door, and in the next area, destroy the door labeled 'Illusion' (attempting to enter it conventionally will not work). Beyond that door is the room with the chest located at (X: 366 Y: 941).

Name: The Annals of Karsus
Description: Located in the vault of Sorcerous Sundries. The book can be found in the Karsus section at (X: 319 Y: 1000).

Name: The Tharchiate Codex
Description: The Tharchiate Codex is stored in the Sorcerous Vault beneath Sorcerous Sundries in the Lower City. You can reach the vault in two different ways: by interacting with the Clasped Book in the bookshelf of Tolna Tome-Monger's office upstairs and going through the portal, or by using the Weave Button labeled 'Vault' on the middle level of Ramazith's Tower. Within the vault, the Codex is located in the Elminster section. To unlock the Elminster door, you must first find the lever at the end of the Silverhand section by opening doors in this order: Silverhand, Evocation, Wish.

Name: Caution Before the Seelie
Description: Located in the Sorcerous Vault beneath Sorcerous Sundries. The book can be found In a hidden library area behind an illusory wall (X: 350 Y: 1010).

Name: The Red Knight's Final Stratagem
Description: Located in the Sorcerous Vault beneath Sorcerous Sundries. The book can be found at (X: 368 Y: 1057), behind a wall just north of the entry portal to the vault, locked behind a hidden button (requires a DC 15 Perception check to reveal).

Name: Danse Macabre
Description: Read The Tharchiate Codex, then read the last page of the Necromancy of Thay (from Act 1) and pass a 20 Wisdom Saving Throw.

Name: Markoheshkir
Description: Located inside an Globe of Invulnerability in Ramazith's Tower during Act Three. (Use See Invisibility to see the lever and disable the globe)

Name: Hellfire Engine Crossbow
Description: Crafted by combining three components found on the main floor of the Steel Watch Foundry at the table (X: -325 Y: -134) in the Security Office, the Watcher Crossbow Blueprint can be located on a table at coordinates (X: -330 Y: -157) within the Security Office. Additionally, the Targeting Module can be discovered on a table at (X: -307 Y: -157) on the main floor right next to the plaque labeled "Watcher Targeting Module." Lastly, the Steel Watcher Arm is situated on a table at (X: -280 Y: -165) on the main floor, adjacent to the plaque labeled "Steel Watcher Arm Unit."

Name: Duke Ravengard's Longsword
Description: The sword can be obtained without requiring Duke Ulder Ravengard's death by having him use the Throw action when he becomes a temporary companion during the quest "The Grand Duke", making it available for looting.

Name: Emblazoned Plate of the Marshal
Description: Can be looted from Duke Ulder Ravengard.

Name: Wavemother's Sickle
Description: Looted from Allandra Grey (If you spared Redhammer).

Name: Gontr Mael
Description: Looted from the Steel Watcher Titan in Steel Watch Foundry.

Name: Handmaiden's Mace
Description: Dropped by Viconia DeVir (X: -400 Y: -1651) in the Cloister of Sombre Embrace beneath the House of Grief.

Name: Viconia's Priestess Robe
Description: Worn by Viconia DeVir, Mother Superior of the Shar Enclave under the House of Grief.

Name: Mirror of Loss
Description: Offer a prayer (DC 25 Religion Check) to the Mirror of Loss in the House of Grief, then sacrifice one of the following: Constitution, Wisdom, Charisma, or your knowledge of the Necromancy of Thay. You'll receive the option to choose a +2 bonus to any ability (Can be raised above 20, up to 24).

Name: Viconia's Walking Fortress
Description: Looted from Viconia DeVir during the quest Daughter of Darkness.

Name: Spell Savant Amulet
Description: Looted from High Security Vault n°1 in The Counting House.

Name: Jannath's Hat
Description: Looted from High Security Vault n°2 in The Counting House.

Name: The Long Arm of the Gur
Description: Looted from High Security Vault n°3 in The Counting House.

Name: Trident of the Waves
Description: Looted from High Security Vault n°4 in The Counting House.

Name: Ravengard's Scourger
Description: Looted from High Security Vault n°5 in The Counting House.

Name: Knock Knuckle Gloves
Description: Looted from High Security Vault n°7 in The Counting House.

Name: Elegant Studded Leather
Description: Looted from High Security Vault n°9 (inside the big vault at the back of the room) in The Counting House of the Lower City. A key for this vault can be obtained by completing Return Rakath's Gold.

Name: Bonespike Gloves
Description: Looted from Strangler Luke in the Undercity Ruins during the quest "Get Orin's Netherstone" as part of the trial to enter the Temple of Bhaal. The enemy will despawn once the trial is complete so the item will need to be obtained before then.

Name: Ring of Feywild Sparks
Description: Looted from Auntie Ethel in the basement of The Blushing Mermaid.

Name: Fey Semblance Amulet
Description: Rewarded for completing "Avenge the Hag Survivors".

Name: Unstable Blood
Description: Give your blood to Araj Oblodra in Moonrise Towers in Act 2, then meet her again east of The Blushing Mermaid in Act 3 and help her again (Your blood is now highly flammable and will explode on contact with fire).

Name: Amulet of Windrider
Description: Reward of the quest "Save Vanra".

Name: Duellist's Prerogative
Description: Reward for completing the quest "Save Vanra".

Name: Shapeshifter Hat
Description: 70 gp.

Name: Gibus of the Worshipful Servant
Description: 35 gp.

Name: Hat of the Sharp Caster
Description: You can locate her on the rooftop of The Devil's Fee at (X: -29 Y: 6), where Tara only accepts Fish and/or magical items as exchange for this item.).

Name: Helldusk Helmet
Description: Found in the House of Hope in a vault across from the entrance to the Boudoir. The player will need to pass a DC10 Wisdom check to activate the Inert Infernal Gem and then a DC20 Arcana check to use the Infernal Control Gem to open the door. The helmet will be located in the treasure pile (X: -6482 Y: 2939).

Name: Staff of Spellpower
Description: Found in the House of Hope in a vault across from the entrance to the Boudoir. The player will need to pass a DC10 Wisdom check to activate the Inert Infernal Gem and then a DC20 Arcana check to use the Infernal Control Gem to open the door. The helmet will be located in the treasure pile (X: -6482 Y: 2939).

Name: Helldusk Gloves
Description: Dropped by Haarlep in the House of Hope.

Name: Gauntlets of Frost Giant Strength
Description: Stolen from a pedestal (X: -6549 Y: 2940) in the Archive of the House of Hope.

Name: Amulet of Greater Health
Description: Stolen from a trapped pedestal (X: -6548 Y: -2901) in the Archive of the House of Hope.

Name: Burnished Ring
Description: Dropped by a Spectator in Hope's Prison.

Name: Amulet of Elemental Torment
Description: Dropped by Hope.

Name: Gloves of Soul Catching
Description: Reward for Save Hope.

Name: Helldusk Armour
Description: Looted from Raphael in Chapter Three in the House of Hope.

Name: Helmet of Grit
Description: Looted from chest in cursed room of Szarr Palace (X: -1298 Y: 965).

Name: Pelorsun Blade
Description: Found in Cazador's Dungeon. From the waypoint, take the second open door on the right. There is a door on the floor below. Teleport or jump down and enter the door. The item is found in this room inside a DC15 trapped Rosewood Casket (X: -1928 Y: 852).

Name: Woe
Description: Reward for defeating Cazador Szarr during "The Pale Elf".

Name: Rhapsody
Description: Dropped by Cazador Szarr.

Name: Balduran's Giantslayer
Description: Rewarded for completing the Wyrmway trials at Dragon's Sanctum.

Name: Helm of Balduran
Description: Found on an altar (X: 636 Y: -964) next to Ansur in the The Dragon's Sanctum.

Name: Tyrannical Jackboots
Description: Can be looted from Enver Gortash.

Name: Cloth of Authority
Description: Can be looted from Enver Gortash.

Name: Fabricated Arbalest
Description: Can be looted from Enver Gortash.

Name: Gauntlet of the Tyrant
Description: Can be looted from Enver Gortash.

Name: Infernal Spear
Description: Looted from Iron Consul Mian and/or Nuff.

Name: Helldusk Boots
Description: Found in a locked Gilded Chest (X: -32 Y: 219) on the top floor of Wyrm's Rock Fortress

Name: Servitor of the Black Hand Gloves
Description: Found in an Opulent Chest (X: -32 Y: 198) on the top floor of Wyrm's Rock Fortress.

Name: Flame Enamelled Armour
Description: Can be found in a chest at Wyrm's Rock Fortress at (X: -28 Y: 184)

Name: Blackguard's Sword
Description: Looted from the undead guardian, That Which Guards.

Name: Shield of the Undevout
Description: Looted from the undead guardian, That Which Guards.

Name: Blackguard's Plate
Description: Looted from the undead guardian, That Which Guards.

Name: Blackguard's Gauntlets
Description: Looted from the undead guardian, That Which Watches.

Name: Blackguard's Greaves
Description: Looted from the undead guardian, That Which Lurks.

Name: Amulet of Bhaal
Description: Looted from Sarevok Anchev or reward by him for Impress the Murder Tribunal. (X: -1248 Y: 503)

Name: Sword of Chaos
Description: Looted from Sarevok.

Name: Sarevok's Horned Helmet
Description: Looted from Sarevok.

Name: Mutilated Carapace
Description: Dropped by Orin during Get "Orin's Netherstone".

Name: Crimson Mischief
Description: Dropped by Orin during Get "Orin's Netherstone".

Name: Bloodthirst
Description: Dropped by Orin during Get "Orin's Netherstone".

Name: Orphic Ring
Description: Looted from Prince Orpheus.
